name: oveqdr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))

stmt.origin: adantr(w0, w1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

comment: Equality of two operations for any two operands. Useful in proofs using *propd theorems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2015.)
